    • selectUnique

      Parameters:
      value - the column that you want to select the unique value from.
      table - the table to query.
      Returns:
      the result set of the completed query.

    • selectConditional

      public static ResultSet selectConditional(String values, String table, String condition, String... comparison)
      Select rows from a table that match the comparison value specified.
      Parameters:
      values - the columns that are to be returned.
      table - the table to query.
      condition - the condition that that is set to be met. For single condition, use format "[condition] =". For multiple conditions, use format "[condition1] = ? AND [condition2] =".
      comparison - the values to inset into the statement. Number of conditions and comparisons must match.
      Returns:
      the result set of the query.
      See Also:
      • setBindVariables(String...)

    • insert

      public static boolean insert(String table, String columns, String... values)
      Insert a singular row into a table.
      Parameters:
      table - the table to insert the row on.
      columns - the columns that will insert values into.
      values - the values that need to be inserted.
      Returns:
      true if insert was successful and false if not.
      See Also:
      • setBindVariables(String...)

    • update

      public static boolean update(String table, String condition, String columns, String... values)
      Update a row(s) on a table matching the condition specified
      Parameters:
      table - the table to update the row on.
      condition - The condition to validate against. Format must be "[condition] = [value]"
      columns - the columns in the row to update. String must be comma delimited.
      values - the values to update in the specified columns.
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if columns lenght and values length don't match or if statement is not successfully executed.
      See Also:
      • setBindVariables(String...)

    • delete

      public static boolean delete(String table, String condition, String comparison)
      Deletes a row from a table matching the specified condition(s). Currently only supporting one condition.
      Parameters:
      table - the table to delete a row from.
      condition - the condition that must be met for the row to be deleted. Format must be "[condition] ="
      comparison - the comparison value that is paired with the condition.
      Returns:
      true if successful and false if not.
